name: Dribbling
criteriaDescription: Keep close control. Change direction quickly. Protect the ball from opponents

name: Header

items.name: The technique of hitting the ball with your head.

criteriaDescription: The technique of hitting the ball with your head. Keep eyes on the ball. Use forehead to strike. Generate power with neck muscles

name: Keepie-Uppie
criteriaDescription: Use feet to juggle. Control ball height. Maintain focus

name: Passing

items.name: Use different types of passes (ground, lofted)

criteriaDescription: Pass with both feet. Use correct weight and timing. Look up before passing. Use different types of passes (ground, lofted)

name: Shooting

items.name: Place shots with inside of foot

criteriaDescription: Strike with laces for power. Place shots with inside of foot. Keep body over the ball. Follow through towards target

name: Tackling
criteriaDescription: Time your tackle accurately. Stay on your feet. Win the ball cleanly. Recover quickly after a challenge

name: Goalkeeping
criteriaDescription: Position yourself correctly. Catch and hold the ball. Make diving saves. Distribute quickly and accurately

name: Ball control

items.name: Control with different parts of the foot
Control the ball in the air

criteriaDescription: Control with different parts of the foot. First touch under pressure. Control the ball in the air. Control using thighs and chest

name: Crossing

items.name: Choose between low and high crosses
Time the cross based on teammates' runs

criteriaDescription: Deliver accurate crosses. Choose between low and high crosses. Time the cross based on teammates' runs. Use both feet for delivery

name: Positioning

items.name: Stay goal side of the opponent

criteriaDescription: Stay goal side of the opponent. Anticipate opponent movement. Find space off the ball. Support teammates with proper spacing

name: Set pieces

items.name: Mark players defensively during set pieces

criteriaDescription: Take accurate free kicks. Time runs for corners. Mark players defensively during set pieces. Understand tactical variations

name: 1v1 defending

items.name: Time the tackle without diving in

criteriaDescription: Stay low and balanced. Force opponent wide. Time the tackle without diving in. Recover quickly if beaten

name: Stamina and fitness

items.name: Maintain high energy levels throughout the game

criteriaDescription: Maintain high energy levels throughout the game. Improve cardiovascular endurance. Incorporate strength training. Proper recovery and hydration

name: Communication

items.name: Listen actively to teammates and coaches

criteriaDescription: Give clear instructions to teammates. Use non-verbal signals effectively. Maintain positive team morale. Listen actively to teammates and coaches

name: Mental toughness
criteriaDescription: Stay focused under pressure. Overcome setbacks quickly. Maintain confidence throughout the game. Visualize success before matches

name: Team tactics
criteriaDescription: Understand formation roles. Adapt to different game plans. Communicate tactical changes quickly. Support teammates during transitions
